titles: An Impartial relation of the whole proceedings against St. Mary Magdalen Colledge in Oxon, in the year of our Lord 1687 containing only matters of fact as they occurred.
author: Fairfax, Henry, 1634-1702.
Fairfax, Henry, 1634-1702.
Aldworth, Charles, 1648 or 9-1720.
Hough, John, 1651-1743.
Bagshaw, Francis, b. 1653 or 4.
notes: Variously attributed to Henry Fairfax, Charles Aldworth, John Hough, and Francis Bagshaw. Cf. BM; Halkett & Laing; Bloxam, J.R. Magdalen College and King James II, 1886.
The copy of this item at reel 1259:30 is incorrectly identified as F125 on film.
Reproductions of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: Magdalen College (University of Oxford) --  History --  Early works to 1800.
